Name: IrreVRsible
About the game: The Virtual Reality has transformed everyone into evil zombies, IrreVRsible makes you fight for your survival against hordes of VR zombies using guns and katanas. Will you survive the IrreVRsible? Unlock weapons by performing katana kills and headshots. Defend your rank against other players on the online scoreboard. Who will be the best survivor of the IrreVRsible?
